page.title: 11Street Life of Penshurst 1
page.content: {Nina Arnott:}Mr & Mrs Pearce own the shop and have 2 employees. Produce - hand made expensive dresses. {Forge Garage:}Owned by Ian & Gordon Streeter, they have 4 employees. Trade - mending cars and selling petrol. {Grocers:}One of the mace chain. Owned by Mr Massey with 4 employees. Trade - tinned & packet food, frozen foods, fresh vegetables and some hardware. {Quaintways:}3 cashiers in sweet shop, 8 waitresses in the tea rooms. Trade - sweets, teas & souveniers. {Fir Trees:}A tea room owned by Mrs Fuller-Rowel serving morning coffee and afternoon teas. She has 8-10 employees. {Surgery:}3 doctors and a pharmacist. {Bank:}It is a National Westminster bank open between 10.00 & 11.30 every Friday morning.
